name: Arushi Sethi
review: The product delivered exactly what we needed. It saved us time and made our workflow so much smoother!

name: Shreesha Keshava
review: The development process was very smooth, with everything delivered on time. The UI looked great and the support we received was excellent!

name: Manya M
review: Sukanta was the core developer of Fireflink and has been part of the product through every phase. From designing the tree structure to execution results, his contributions shaped almost every aspect of the platform.

name: Thijs van der
review: He designed an internal tool for Philips to simplify the naming convention process for Proposition Managers. The solution was well thought out and highly effective.

name: Upasana Das
review: Amazing experience overall! The design and usability really stood out and made our work so much easier.
